protocol.name: P-G3984-1
protocol.text: Plants were sprayed with 0.01% Silwet 2 hours before harvesting of leaves

protocol.name: P-G3984-2
protocol.text: Plants were sprayed with 0.01% Silwet and 1 mM salicylic acid 2 hours before harvesting of leaves
